title: Bookkeeper/Office Admin Franks Heating & Refrigeration is
text:
Bookkeeper/Office Admin Franks Heating & Refrigeration is ad date: 10/10/2015 
Bookkeeper/Office Admin Franks Heating & Refrigeration is looking for a team player who is organized, detail oriented with the ability to prioritize. Duties include, but are not limited to, recording financial transactions, posting invoices, maintain personnel and payroll records, prepare payroll, submit quarterly taxes, provide daily/weekly reporting to management. Prepare written correspondence and interact with customers and vendors. Must have basic computer knowledge, incl. MS Word, Excel, Quickbooks. Pay DOE, benefits after 3 mo. of employment and 401K benefits after 1 yr. of employment. Franks Heating & Refrigeration is a family run business that not only focuses on customer satisfaction but also on personal growth within the company. Our mission is to provide the highest quality products and service to our community through innovative team spirit and continued education. To apply, please bring resume and pick up an application at: 250 Michigan Rd. Crescent City, CA
